summary: When six teenage boys came together as a skateboarding team in the 1980s, they reinvented not only their chosen sport but themselves too - as they evolved from insecure outsiders to the most influential athletes in the field.
cast: Tony Alva|Steve Caballero|Fred Durst|Shepard Fairey|Alan Gelfand|Tommy Guerrero|Ben Harper|Kevin Harris|Tony Hawk|Christian Hosoi|Mike McGill|Lance Mountain|Rodney Mullen|Steve Olson|Stacy Peralta|Duane Peters|George Powell
title: Bones Brigade: An Autobiography
